overview: A mother tells her daughter a fable about the prince of the brumbies, brumby being a term for the feral horses of Australia, who must find its place among its kind, while one man makes it his mission to capture it and tame it.  Australian adaptation of Elyne Mitchell's "The silver Brumby".
tagline: The magic of the mountain. The obsession of a man. The beauty of the Silver Brumby.
title: The Silver Brumby
